Package xxl.core.xxlinq

Interface Summary
CorrTuplesReceiver Classes should implement this interface, if they need Correlated Tuples.
 

Class Summary
AdvPredicate A (AdvResultSet)MetaData-aware Predicate on Tuples to be used mainly in JOINS and WHERE-clauses of the AdvTupleCursor.
AdvResultSetMetaData  
AdvTupleCursor A Cursor wrapping another Cursor/Iterator/Iterable to a Tuple Cursor with AdvResultSetMetaData and CompositeMetaData.
AggregateColumn  
AggregateUtils Aggregation functions to be used with AdvTupleCursor#groupBy(Column[], MetaDataAggregationFunction...)
GroupAggregator The aggregator computes aggregates like SUM, COUNT and VARIANCE for a grouped input metadata cursor, i.e., an input cursor delivering groups (cursors) of input elements.
Intersection<E> A nested-loops implementation of the intersection operator.
IterableCursor<E> A Cursor that wraps any Iterable, like all those standard java Collection classes like LinkedList etc, into a resettable Cursor.
NestedLoopsIntersection<E> A nested-loops implementation of the intersection operator.
NewLINQFunctions  
OperatorImplementation This class implements all relational operators used by AdvTupleCursor as static functions.
Projection  
ResettableSequentializer<E> A sequentializer concatenates n input iterations to a single one.
TupleMaximum  
 

Enum Summary
AdvTupleCursor.CachingStrategy The Caching-Strategy to be used in a query's AdvTupleCursors:
ALL: Cache within all operators of a query NONE: Don't cache at all ONLY_FIRST: Only cache the first cursor so the Elements of the Input-Cursor don't have to be mapped to Tuples again after reset().
AdvTupleCursor.JOIN_TYPE
